Description:
Families of All Ages
Located in a quiet spot amidst a beautiful flourishing garden, this well-presented and lovingly maintained double-storey BV home offers to families of all ages a spacious floor plan with plenty of room to move.
From the large entrance hall, an l-shaped lounge and dining room lead to the kitchen/meals area and light-filled family room beyond. Floor to ceiling windows overlook the paved outdoor entertaining area, in-ground spa and lovely landscaped garden. Upstairs there are 5 bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, PLUS a study and central bathroom.
In a highly regarded area close to McAdam Square, parks, buses and quality schools including Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College, this home is truly an A-list property. Be quick to inspect!
Features: evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, downstairs powder room, slate and floating timber flooring, DLUG with internal access.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

FAMILY LIVING!
This four bedroom, two bathroom home is located in the much sought after Croydon Hills area close to schools and parkland.
The large lounge has cathedral ceilings and opens out to the private covered entertaining area with views to parkland.
Other features include a huge master bedroom with full ensuite, entertainer's kitchen with a great family area and a secure family friendly yard and double lock-up garage complete the picture.
Call for an inspection today.

Description:
INDOOR-OUTDOOR LIVING and ENTERTAINING!
Presenting this stylish and impressive family home where the proportions will please, the entertaining options delight and the location tempts you! The substantial interior focuses on the vast lounge, dining and family area incorporating adjoining study and the well equipped kitchen. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the main bedroom with retreat, walk in robe and ensuite and upstairs is a fourth bedroom with its own retreat and powder room a great chill out zone! Features include ducted heating, slate flooring and polished floor boards, auto double garage with internal access and a triple carport. Casual outdoor entertaining is taken care of with the in ground pool and covered alfresco entertaining area overlooking the manicured garden. This home is positioned to please, handy to Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, primary schools, McAdam Square, buses, Eastland and Eastlink.

Description:
Fun & Games at ‘Candelbark Resort’
Expect an exciting new life to unfold from this owner-built home in the prestigious heights of Croydon Hills. Set on almost 3/4s of an acre, the big-hearted 4-bedroom overlooks Candlebark Walk and the lake, where you can bushwalk, fish and spot local wildlife like kangaroos and kookaburras. An indoor sports stadium, BMX track and downstairs teenage retreat will get the kids jumping, leaving parents to take in the picturesque vistas from the glass-fronted family room. Entertain in style, treating your guests to a grand circular driveway and portico, the comfort of ducted heating, evaporative cooling and the romantic charm of a Baltic pine kitchen and buttercup walls. With nearby Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Rudolph Steiner, this is a location where your kids can get ahead, and still live the great country lifestyle. It’s the perfect property to give your family a bigger, better, brighter future. Golf champion Aaron Baddeley lived in this suburb until he turned pro. Maybe your little superstar will be the next famous face to come out of Croydon Hills?

Description:
WELL, WELL, WELL!
Sale by Negotiation
An Ex-Display home, built by AV Jennings, this well-located, well-built and well-maintained property promises a balanced lifestyle of comfort, convenience and relaxation. Featuring good quality living in a family-friendly locale, this 3 bedroom plus study home provides an appealing floorplan and is serviced by a well appointed formal lounge and dining with a cosy open fireplace, a large, light-filled kitchen including a spacious meals area and a generous zoned family/rumpus room ideal for the growing family. Complete with gas ducted heating, air conditioning, an ensuite to the master bedroom, a large covered entertaining area surrounded by a beautiful garden domain and an enclosed, gas heated outdoor spa perfect for 'all seasons' entertaining, the home includes a remote double lock-up garage and is positioned minutes to primary schools, childcare facilities, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, lakeside walking tracks and public transport. Worthy of your immediate inspection, call today!
Brian Puls : 0418 340 533

Description:
Superb home, marvellous position!
$510,000 - $560,000
This beautiful architecturally designed 4 bedroom plus study home with sheltered northern alfresco terraces is set in easily maintained gardens and a beautiful quiet court with its own little park. It is near Croydon Hills Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College.
Clearly inspired by Merchant Builders and Fasham Johnson, this immaculate home offers extensive sun-filled formal and casual living areas overlooking the sunny gardens. Its bright rooms feature immaculate limed timber ceilings with clearstory windows (and cathedral ceilings in the impressive dining room). It includes an entrance hall, living and adjoining dining areas, an excellent fully equipped timber kitchen with ample cupboards and adjoining family room with bay window, plus a great games/rumpus room - all overlooking the gardens!
The main bedroom with ensuite and study is separately zoned from the other 3 bedrooms, family bathroom with separate toilet, and laundry. The gardens include rainwater tanks. Also; gas heating, reverse cycle split system air-conditioner, lots of storage plus a workshop, double carport with store.
A home to enjoy every day in every season.
* 4 bedrooms plus study
* 4 excellent living areas
* Superb sheltered garden terraces
* Bright rooms, beautifully presented
* Quiet court with park
* Walk to schools
Land 848 sq m approx. irregular
Terms 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Get photos and details to your mobile now
SMS the property ID 388931 to 0428 796 786 Standard SMS charges apply.

Family "Feel-Good" Factor
Sale by Negotiation
Offering a PERFECTLY presented interior enhanced by up-to-the minute floor coverings and paintwork, this perfectly positioned property is located with a stones throw to both Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, McAdam square shopping facilities, transport and lakeside walking tracks. Serviced by a well appointed lounge and dining room, a LARGE well-equipped kitchen and a HUGE sun-filled meals area, this fabulous 3 bedroom home delivers the family "feel-good" factor. Fastidiously maintained, the home is ideal for families, first home buyers or investors and is highlighted by gas heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, an ENORMOUS outdoor covered entertaining area and a private, family-friendly rear yard (perfect for the kids to play). Complete with carport accommodation (rear drive-thru access), ample off street parking potential and a garden shed, the home is guaranteed to please and is ready to move in without a cent to spend! Inspect without delay!

Description:
A MUCH LOVED FAMILY HOME
The condition and presentation of this home is testament to its only owners who have cared for and nurtured it throughout its life. The verdant garden surrounds provide a colourful frame for this wonderful home featuring a warm and inviting lounge and dining room as well as a timeless Blackwood kitchen adjoining the open family and casual dining area. There are 3 robed bedrooms plus a study or 4th bedroom and 2 bathrooms including a full ensuite for the main bedroom. Ducted heating is a welcome extra and you'll also find low voltage lighting throughout, a double carport, garden and work sheds and covered patio that overlooks that lush rear garden. It's also handy to many facilities including Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College, buses and McAdam Square Shopping Centre.
Please call Paul English on 0412 431 363 or Brad Hateley 0412 933 883.

Description:
Luxury Retreat with Bright Positioning
IMPORTANT NOTICE: The 5km rule DOES NOT apply to private property inspections and you can attend an inspection with your intimate partner or other household member. THIS PROPERTY IS AVAILABLE TO INSPECT NOW.
Forthcoming Auction. Offers Invited.
Fresh luxurious living and a relaxed sense of inviting comfort make this sensational villa the ideal investment or starter home.
Located in a quiet pocket of Croydon North and with splashes of immaculate contemporary style, this bright and cheery unit is striking with a generous living space moving seamlessly across to the pristinely presented kitchen with stone surfaces, stainless steel gas appliances and a dishwasher.
Two well sized bedrooms both come equipped with built-in robes, the main with ensuite effect to the deluxe bathroom featuring an oversized shower and a separate bath while a private and easy to maintain courtyard includes a sundrenched elevated deck to entertain family and guests.
This fabulous "nothing more to be done" home also provides polished timber flooring, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, split system unit, LED down lights, a separate laundry and a single lock up garage with internal and rear access.
A short distance to Hochins Ridge Flora Reserve with walking trails, Griff Hunt Reserve, Coles, Maroondah Golf Park, Chirnside Park Shopping and Cinema, Manchester Primary School, Yarra Road Primary School transport, Eastland, Costco, EastLink and Eastern Freeway.
Auction 24th of October at 10am
To view the Statement of Information please use the link below:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1x-U5BTk23S50Sf5wVm51Vh5_HKVObjIC?usp=sharing

Description:
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT TO ARRANGE A SUITABLE TIME.
LIVE THE LIFE YOU LOVE!
Presented over a single-storey at the rear with fresh paint and plush new carpet; this generous sized unit located in Ringwood Central has all the trappings to support a comfortable lifestyle with easy-care interior and exterior space.
One of only three properties on the block, this home is sure to attract the attention of small families, first home buyers and young professionals. A warm and welcoming home, the floorplan incorporates an inviting light-filled north facing open plan living and dining area, spacious kitchen with breakfast bar, gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, pantry and storage galore.
From the dining area, sliding doors open to a private paved terrace with a beautiful established courtyard garden, providing a quiet, picturesque sitting area for summer BBQs, after work drinks, or the ideal spot for alfresco entertaining.
Placed off a central hallway for peace and privacy, three bright bedrooms with built-in robes are well serviced by a pristine family bathroom with a separate toilet. Other property features include laundry, security doors, ducted heating, split system air conditioning and a double auto garage with courtyard access. There are also no Body Corporate fees to be paid!
Set on 193sqm (approx.), the location is incredible, a short walk to Eastland Shopping Centre, Costco, Ringwood Train Station, local bus services and Munro Street Reserve, with excellent access to Eastlink, the Ringwood Bypass and leisure facilities. Ideally zoned for Norwood Secondary College and Ringwood Heights Primary Schools.
Life doesn't get much better!

Description:
Lifestyle Prize in Central Croydon
Bathed in northerly sunshine and bursting with open plan space, this splendid apartment perfects lifestyle living with is premium location in central Croydon ensuring amenities are right on your doorstep. Well formed to offer separation between the living and sleeping quarters, the apartment offers the appeal of an entry foyer with cloak closet flowing freely through to the open plan living, dining and kitchen boasting Fisher & Paykel appliances, dish drawer dishwasher plus an island breakfast bench. Filling the space with natural light and offering a wonderful indoor-outdoor connection, sliding doors open onto a northerly oriented balcony thatâs superbly covered for all-weather enjoyment. A Euro laundry and family bathroom separate the two bedrooms from the living zone, with one of the bedrooms complemented by mirrored built-in-robes and private outdoor access for relaxed enjoyment. Further enhanced with split system heating/air conditioning, intercom entry, high ceilings plus a car space. Presenting a prized lifestyle only meters from Main St Croydon, Croydon Oval, Croydon Train Station, restaurants and cafes.

Description:
WITH THE FAMILY IN MIND
As times have now changed and the focus in now on family living, you will be impressed by the renovations that have taken place so far on this wonderful home on a land size of 865m2 approx.
Family focus has been achieved with the centrally positioned beautifully appointed fully equipped kitchen with caesar stone benchtops, glass splash back, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. Natural light is provided by the skylight, and oversees the meals and open plan family living area with gas feature fire, flowing to the outdoor covered patio. The bi fold doors to study allow privacy for working from home or act as another living area with additional access to the undercover patio.
Accommodation is provided by the 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the Master Bedroom with full ensuite and bedrooms 2 and 3 serviced with the second bathroom.
The separate lounge provides a second living area as a private retreat away from the family or as the children's TV playroom or learning centre.
Off street parking is with the double carport and for the home handyman or tradie looking for a decent shed this is provided with the 19m x 3.6m approx. tandem shed/garage with its own access and surrounded by established gardens.
Extras include, gas ducted heating, split systems, and floating floors.
With bus service, schools, sporting facilities and shops not far away your family's needs are well catered for.
Contact us to book in a private inspection.

Description:
Stylish Space With Sought-After Privacy
Introduced by a beautifully landscaped front garden and secluded rear position, this larger than average villa-home delivers the perfect lifestyle without the ongoing maintenance of a large block. From the elevated front porch, youre welcomed into a formal dining room thats ideal for everyday meals right through to dinner parties with friends; stepping down to a huge living room enhanced by a towering ceiling and crackling open fire to warm your toes by.
The central kitchen with timber benchtops and a gas cooktop overlooks a sun-soaked meals area; whilst accommodation comprises two generous bedrooms (master with built-in robes) and an updated bathroom with a separate toilet. Outdoors, a covered alfresco zone provides the ideal setting for relaxing and entertaining all year round; leading to the manicured front garden with terrific space for children and pets.
Amongst the highlights are secure gated entry, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, water tank, garden shed, under house storage and a double auto garage. Desirably located a stones throw from B.J. Hubbard Reserve, and moments from Ringwood North Primary School and Norwood Secondary College (both zoned), Eastland Shopping Centre, Eastlink, scenic parks, walking trails and leisure facilities.

Description:
Investment In A Lifestyle
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT AGENT TO ARRANGE A SUITABLE TIME.
The acreage dream is something that many aspire to, yet few are lucky enough to realise in their lifetime. Set on a sprawling allotment of 4001sqm approx., this might well be the property to bring these dreams to life.
The updated home is ideal for family living, with well-zoned spaces that have the ability to adapt and evolve with your needs over time. At one end is a sizeable living/dining space that youll love spending time in, courtesy of an oversized open fireplace, high vaulted ceilings and expanses of floorboards that stretch throughout much of the home. The large master bedroom which boasts a generous walk-in robe and a modern ensuite is adjacent, allowing privacy from the rest of the homes occupants.
At the opposite end of the abode are two further robed bedrooms that are serviced by a central bathroom and a powder room. These adjoin an expansive family room with a wood burning fire which is the perfect place for casual relaxation.
Creating a central meeting place, which is undoubtedly the hub of the home, is a fully renovated kitchen/meals area with deep modern benchtops, quality appliances, an abundance of storage space and a walk-in pantry; adding to this is a long breakfast bench providing the ideal place for casual meals on the run.
This is a home where your favourite place will change with the seasons, and in summer its guaranteed that youll spend as much time as you can relaxing by the inviting inground pool, which is nestled amongst the greenery of lush gardens. Below this is a substantial freestanding pavilion where you can both lounge and dine with family and friends, whilst remaining protected from the elements.
There are a range of extras that complement the home to perfection. They include a study/4th bedroom, gas ducted heating, a garden shed, veggie patches and chook pens plus an oversized double garage with internal entry. This property allows you to live the tranquil country life whilst still being in close proximity to desirable amenities such as local buses, sought after schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and The Rudolph Steiner School, a range of shopping precincts and endless amounts of open green spaces.
Dont let someone else live the lifestyle you deserve. Inspect without delay and realise your dream.

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Superb Lifestyle and Smart Investment
Set yourself up for lifestyle or investment success, with this traditional single-level unit in the beating heart of Ringwood.
Lavished with natural sunlight, the home showcases a simple, yet functional floorplan, where polished floorboards and fresh paint create a comfortable ambience for immediate enjoyment or enhancement.
Instantly inviting, a spacious front lounge offers ample room for relaxation and leads through to an original gas equipped kitchen with accompanying meals area.
Two robed bedrooms supply restful accommodation both sharing the use of a central bathroom and a separate toilet.
The laundry accesses a private courtyard, where you can unwind or alfresco dine with friends amid low maintenance garden surrounds.
Split system heating/cooling and a double lock-up garage complete the attractive easy-care package, which is located within arm's reach of all the area's key attractions.
Situated within Ringwood's thriving retail and entertainment precinct, it is a short stroll to Eastland Shopping Centre, Town Square, Costco, Ringwood Train Station and the Mullum Mullum Creek Trail. Only minutes from EastLink, childcare centres and schools; including zoned Ringwood Secondary College.
Insights: First listed on 2 October, this unit has been on Domain for 19 days (last updated on 2 October). It was last sold in 2000 and 111 other 2 bedroom unit in Ringwood have recently been sold.
